item.description:
We are meeting at the new Joe's American Bar and Grill on the northeast corner of Newbury St. and Exeter St. in the Back Bay.

This meeting has been moved as I will be out of town on Jan. 23.
item.how_to_find_us: If you can't find the meeting, you can call my cell: (312) 497-9903.

group.name: The Boston Area Libertarian Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Area Libertarian Meetup Group Monthly Meetup
